name: another day in the zones
description:
cw: this game discusses death and loss in abstract terms

story by lucy valk quill
font is Inconsolata

using songs from My Chemical Romance's album "Danger Days", featuring lyrics from
- look alive, sunshine
- planetary GO!!
- jet-star and the kobra kid/traffic report
- party poison (japanese translation from mychemicalromance.com)

submitted to record collection 2k20 on itch
